description:
The whole crew goes location hunting for a report on fireflies.  Takahashi and Kanae share a beautiful moment together as they watch the fireflies. But the snapping man has an offer for Kanae...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ano Hi no Hotaru o Sagashite!?
Searching for the Fireflies from That Day!?
あの日のホタルを探して!?
